## BlockTypeEventPayloads."BLOCK\_TYPE.INTERACT" property

Emitted when a player interacts with a block type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[BlockTypeEvent.INTERACT]: {
        blockType: BlockType;
        player: Player;
        raycastHit?: RaycastHit;
    };
```
